In the movie 'A Wednesday!' released in 2008, what was significant about the terrorist's workstation?
Options:
A. It was located in a crowded marketplace.
B. It was an actual under-construction 25-storey building chosen for its view of the Mumbai skyline.
C. It was hidden in a remote forest.
D. It was situated in a busy airport terminal.
Correct Answer: It was an actual under-construction 25-storey building chosen for its view of the Mumbai skyline.
